00020 
00021 static void ob_angmom(void* par,
00022                       const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00023                       const GaussianAux* X, complex double ang[3])
00024 {
00025   complex double l2, s2, ls;
00026 
00027   l2 = (2*X->lambda*
00028         (conj(G1->b[0])*G2->b[0]+conj(G1->b[1])*G2->b[1]+conj(G1->b[2])*G2->b[2]) +
00029         X->rho2*X->pi2 - csqr(X->rhopi))*X->Q;
00030   s2 = 0.75*X->Q;
00031   ls = 0.5*cvec3mult(X->rhoxpi, X->sig)* X->T* X->R;
00032   
00033   ang[0] += l2;
00034   ang[1] += s2;
00035   ang[2] += l2 + s2 + 2*ls;
00036 }
00037 
00038 
00039 static void tb_angmom(void* par,
00040                       const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00041                       const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4, 
00042                       const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24, 
00043                       complex double ang[3])
00044 {       
00045   complex double l2, s2, ls;
00046 
00047   l2 = cvec3mult(X13->rhoxpi, X24->rhoxpi)* X13->Q* X24->Q;
00048   s2 = 0.25*cvec3mult(X13->sig, X24->sig)* X13->T* X24->T* X13->R* X24->R;
00049   ls = 0.25*(cvec3mult(X13->rhoxpi, X24->sig)*X13->S+
00050              cvec3mult(X13->sig, X24->rhoxpi)*X24->S)*
00051        X13->T* X24->T* X13->R* X24->R;
00052 
00053   ang[0] += 2*l2;
00054   ang[1] += 2*s2;
00055   ang[2] += 2*(l2 + s2 + 2*ls);
00056 }
00057 
00058 static void ob_l(void* par,
00059                  const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00060                  const GaussianAux* X, complex double l[3])
00061 {
00062   int i;
00063 
00064   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00065     l[i] += X->T* X->rhoxpi[i]*X->S* X->R;
00066 }
00067 
00068 static void ob_s(void* par,
00069                  const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00070                  const GaussianAux* X, complex double s[3])
00071 {
00072   int i;
00073 
00074   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00075     s[i] += X->T* 0.5*X->sig[i]* X->R;
00076 }
00077 
00078 static void ob_j(void* par,
00079                  const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00080                  const GaussianAux* X, complex double j[3])
00081 {
00082   int i;
00083 
00084   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00085     j[i] += X->T*(X->rhoxpi[i]*X->S + 0.5*X->sig[i])* X->R;
00086 }
00087 
00088 
00089 static void ob_j2(void* par,
00090                   const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00091                   const GaussianAux* X, complex double j2[3])
00092 {
00093   complex double l2, s2, ls;
00094   int i;
00095 
00096   for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00097     l2 = (X->lambda* (conj(G1->b[(i+1)%3])*G2->b[(i+1)%3]+ 
00098                       conj(G1->b[(i+2)%3])*G2->b[(i+2)%3]) + 
00099           csqr(X->rhoxpi[i]))*X->Q;
00100     s2 = 0.25*X->Q;
00101     ls = 0.5*X->rhoxpi[i]* X->sig[i]* X->T* X->R;
00102   
00103     j2[i] += l2 + 2*ls + s2;
00104   }
00105 }
00106 
00107 
00108 static void tb_j2(void* par,
00109                   const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00110                   const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4, 
00111                   const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24, 
00112                   complex double j2[3])
00113 {       
00114   complex double l2, s2, ls;
00115   int i;
00116 
00117   for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00118     l2 = X13->rhoxpi[i]* X24->rhoxpi[i]* X13->Q* X24->Q;
00119     s2 = 0.25*X13->sig[i]* X24->sig[i]* X13->T* X24->T* X13->R* X24->R;
00120     ls = 0.25*(X13->rhoxpi[i]* X24->sig[i]* X13->S+
00121                X13->sig[i]* X24->rhoxpi[i]* X24->S)*
00122       X13->T* X24->T* X13->R* X24->R;
00123 
00124     j2[i] += 2*(l2 + s2 + 2*ls);
00125   }
00126 }

00128 
00129 void calcAngularMomenta(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00130                         double* l2, double* s2, double* j2)
00131 {
00132   double angone[3], angtwo[3];
00133   OneBodyOperator op_ob_angmom = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: NULL, me: ob_angmom};
00134   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_angmom = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: NULL, me: tb_angmom};
00135 
00136 
00137   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_angmom, angone);
00138   calcSlaterDetTBME(Q, X, &op_tb_angmom, angtwo);
00139 
00140   *l2 = angone[0] + angtwo[0];
00141   *s2 = angone[1] + angtwo[1];
00142   *j2 = angone[2] + angtwo[2];
00143 }

00146 void calcAngularMomentaod(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00147                           const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00148                           complex double* l2, complex double* s2, 
00149                           complex double* j2)
00150 {
00151   complex double angone[3], angtwo[3];
00152   OneBodyOperator op_ob_angmom = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: NULL, me: ob_angmom};
00153   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_angmom = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: NULL, me: tb_angmom};
00154 
00155 
00156   calcSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_ob_angmom, angone);
00157   calcSlaterDetTBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_tb_angmom, angtwo);
00158 
00159   *l2 = angone[0] + angtwo[0];
00160   *s2 = angone[1] + angtwo[1];
00161   *j2 = angone[2] + angtwo[2];
00162 }

00165 void calcl2HF(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00166               void* mes)
00167 {
00168   OneBodyOperator op_ob_angmom = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: NULL, me: ob_angmom};
00169   int A=Q->A;
00170   complex double angmommes[A*A][3];
00171   complex double *l2mes = mes;
00172 
00173   calcSlaterDetOBHFMEs(Q, X, &op_ob_angmom, angmommes);
00174 
00175   int k,m;
00176   for (m=0; m<A; m++)
00177     for (k=0; k<A; k++)
00178       l2mes[k+m*A] = angmommes[k+m*A][0];
00179 }

00182 void calcj2HF(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00183               void* mes)
00184 {
00185   OneBodyOperator op_ob_angmom = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: NULL, me: ob_angmom};
00186   int A=Q->A;
00187   complex double angmommes[A*A][3];
00188   complex double *j2mes = mes;
00189 
00190   calcSlaterDetOBHFMEs(Q, X, &op_ob_angmom, angmommes);
00191 
00192   int k,m;
00193   for (m=0; m<A; m++)
00194     for (k=0; k<A; k++)
00195       j2mes[k+m*A] = angmommes[k+m*A][2];
00196 }

00199 void calcJ2(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00200             double j2[3])
00201 {
00202   double j2one[3], j2two[3];
00203   int i;
00204   OneBodyOperator op_ob_j2 = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: NULL, me: ob_j2};
00205   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_j2 = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: NULL, me: tb_j2};
00206 
00207   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_j2, j2one);
00208   calcSlaterDetTBME(Q, X, &op_tb_j2, j2two);
00209 
00210   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00211     j2[i] = j2one[i] + j2two[i];
00212 }

00215 void calcJ2od(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00216               const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00217               complex double j2[3])
00218 {
00219   complex double j2one[3], j2two[3];
00220   int i;
00221   OneBodyOperator op_ob_j2 = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: NULL, me: ob_j2};
00222   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_j2 = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: NULL, me: tb_j2};
00223 
00224   calcSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_ob_j2, j2one);
00225   calcSlaterDetTBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_tb_j2, j2two);
00226 
00227   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00228     j2[i] = j2one[i] + j2two[i];
